short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Optimize response to this content when you send messages to customers at Yahoo

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Yahoo Customer Service Helper is a Chrome extension to help Yahoo seller message with customers smoothly. It a free tool like Crisp magicRply or Drift GPT. Simply select the customer's question, then Yahoo Customer Service Helper will feedback the reply advice that given by GPT-3.5 Chatbot.

ğŸš€ Feature
â— Provide canned responses or reply template by ChatGPT base on the question of customers.
â— Simply select the question content.
â— Edit feedback from OpenAI in Yahoo Customer Service Helper to reply nicely to customers
â— Copy content by one click. 
â— Multiple output languages.

ğŸš€ Who is Yahoo Customer Service Helper for
Yahoo Customer Service Helper is made for Yahoo seller, customer service staff or someone need reply customer's question to solve their problem.

ğŸš€ How to use it
â¡ï¸ Make sure you have a ChatGPT account
â¡ï¸ Simply select any online content by your mouse
â¡ï¸ Click on Cmd+M (Mac) or Ctrl+M (Windows) to open the extension window
â¡ï¸ Choose what languages you need, and click "Ask for template"
â¡ï¸ The canned responses will displayed in the extension window in a minute.
